name: BananianX
tagline: Install GUI on Bananian - Graphical UI BananianX
body:
### Welcome to BananianX I have created a Skript, which installs GUI on the Banana Pi. Bananian was made for the Banana Pi as Server, so you don´t really need a GUI. But some people would like to have a GUI, so I have made this Skript. It is available in English and German. Currently it is in BETA state, and there may be issues. Please tell me. ### README Here is a script, which installs GUI on bananian. It installs LightDM, LXDE and Openbox.
Why have I made it? Because I thought there are many people who would like to have a graphical interface on their Banana Pi. Bananian was made for a lightweight Banana Pi, so there's no GUI. Bananian was made for servers, which usually don't need a GUI. But sometimes a GUI is useful. So I made this script. It is available in English and German.

How to install?

1. Download bananianX or download the German version bananianXDE.sh.
2. Make it executable: chmod +x bananianX.sh or chmod +x bananianXDE.sh
3. Run it ./bananianX.sh or ./bananianXDE.sh 4. Wait... BananianX is in BETA state currently. So it might not work as expected for now. Currently I haven´t installed it yet, but you can install it and try it now.
Website: https://jonisc.github.io/bananianX/ #Contact You can contact me with this form: https://goo.gl/forms/qAs64z4lgxsgUxVp2
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
